changeSet.author: hhildebrand
changeSet.sql:
CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW readable.service_sequencing_authorization AS SELECT base_table.id, p.name AS parent, sc.name AS status_code, base_table.sequence_number, nc.name AS next_child, ncs.name AS next_child_status, nss.name AS next_sibling, nss.name AS next_sibling_status, mp.name AS my_parent, mps.name AS parent_status_to_set, base_table.set_if_active_siblings, base_table.notes, res.name AS research, up.name AS updated_by, base_table.update_date FROM ruleform.service_sequencing_authorization base_table JOIN ruleform.entity p ON base_table.parent = p.id JOIN ruleform.status_code sc ON base_table.status_code = sc.id LEFT JOIN ruleform.entity nc ON base_table.next_child = nc.id LEFT JOIN ruleform.status_code ncs ON base_table.next_child_status = ncs.id LEFT JOIN ruleform.entity ns ON base_table.next_sibling = ns.id LEFT JOIN ruleform.status_code nss ON base_table.next_sibling_status = nss.id LEFT JOIN ruleform.entity mp ON base_table.my_parent = mp.id LEFT JOIN ruleform.status_code mps ON base_table.parent_status_to_set = mps.id LEFT JOIN ruleform.research res ON base_table.research = res.id JOIN ruleform.resource up ON base_table.updated_by = up.id;
ALTER TABLE readable.service_sequencing_authorization OWNER TO core; GRANT ALL ON TABLE readable.service_sequencing_authorization TO core; GRANT SELECT ON TABLE readable.service_sequencing_authorization TO core_read_write; GRANT SELECT ON TABLE readable.service_sequencing_authorization TO core_read_only;
